title: Bwithelhem hadorni bwi goali noao
lyrics:
Bwithelhem hadorni bwi goali noao
Thu lwgwfwr rongzalangni
Thu lwgwfwr mwsalangni
(a)
Sari jabai ou sari jabai
Jiuni rajaya dinwi sari jabai
“Sona-rupa lanan thangw
Bwi naihor Jotisifra
 Dinthilangw lama honwi
Bwi gwjwn hathorkifra” -2
(b)
Sari jabai ou sari jabai
Jiuni rajaya dinwi sari jabai
“Papifwrkhou fwjakhangnw
khwmsi be buhum bikhayao
Swrangbwgou Jiuni sranga
bwi gwthar Bwithelhemao” -2
